model
Class Model

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--model.Model
public class Model
extends java.lang.Object
implements model.Condition

This class holds the condition of the road. When the user clicks a button, to accelerate or turn left, etc., the amount of acceleration, turn, etc., depends on the road conditions.

This class implements the State pattern.

          Gravel condition state.
